pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wrapper for the 'CVD Prevent' Application Programming Interface // Provides an R wrapper to the 'CVD Prevent' application programming interface (API). Users can make API requests through built-in R functions. The Cardiovascular Disease Prevention Audit (CVDPREVENT) is an England-wide primary care audit that automatically extracts routinely held GP health data. https://bmchealthdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CP/pages/ 317882369/CVDPREVENT+API+Documentation.
